settings.title: Settings
settings.resetConfirmDescription: This action will reset all settings to default values and cannot be undone. A page refresh is required for changes to take effect.

configurationAssistant.title: AI Agent Creation Assistant
configurationAssistant.description: Create your custom agent through conversation. Tell me what kind of agent you want? For example, its professional field, personality traits, and main purpose.

discussion.title: Discussion
discussion.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this discussion? This action cannot be undone.
discussion.clearMessagesDescription: Are you sure you want to clear all messages? This action cannot be undone.

chat.selectOrCreate: Please select or create a session
chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message here... (Type @ to mention members)
chat.inputPlaceholderDesktop: Type a message here... (Type @ to mention members)
chat.sendHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

allInOneAgent.name: Atlas Super Agent
allInOneAgent.prompt: You are a world-class super intelligent assistant with ultimate experience and capabilities.

suggestions.recommendTools: Recommend some AI tools to improve efficiency

welcomeHeader.description: Let AI expert teams brainstorm and spark inspiration

initialInput.placeholderMobile: Describe the topic you want to explore, tap ✨ to start...
initialInput.placeholderDesktop: Describe the topic you want to explore, press Enter to start...
initialInput.hintDesktop: Press Enter to start, let AI expert teams answer for you

subscribeIframeMessages.description: Subscribe to messages from a specific iframe, listen to postMessage messages sent from within the iframe, and automatically notify the agent when messages are received
subscribeIframeMessages.iframeIdDescription: The iframe ID to subscribe to messages from
subscribeIframeMessages.timeoutDescription: Subscription timeout in milliseconds, automatically unsubscribe after timeout
subscribeIframeMessages.descriptionDescription: Subscription description to identify the purpose of the subscription
subscribeIframeMessages.autoNotifyAgentDescription: Whether to automatically notify the agent when messages are received, default is true
subscribeIframeMessages.subscriptionSuccess: Successfully subscribed to messages from iframe {{iframeId}}
subscribeIframeMessages.subscriptionSuccessWithAutoNotify: Successfully subscribed to messages from iframe {{iframeId}}, agent will be automatically notified when messages are received
subscribeIframeMessages.title: iframe Message Subscription Tool
subscribeIframeMessages.processMessage: Please process or reply based on this message content.

htmlPreviewFromFile.description: Read HTML content from the specified file path and preview it in the right panel
htmlPreviewFromFile.filePathDescription: The HTML file path to read and preview
htmlPreviewFromFile.invalidHtmlFile: File content does not contain HTML tags, may not be a valid HTML file
htmlPreviewFromFile.title: HTML File Preview Tool

calculator.description: Simple calculator supporting basic arithmetic expressions
calculator.title: Calculator

weather.description: Query weather for a specified city (simulated data)
weather.title: Weather Query
weather.defaultWeather: Sunny 25°C Humidity 50% West Wind 2 ({{city}}, simulated data)
weather.hangzhouWeather: Sunny to Cloudy 26°C Humidity 50% West Wind 2

sendMessageToIframe.description: Send postMessage to a specific iframe, the message parameter will be sent as-is without structural transformation
sendMessageToIframe.messageDescription: Message content to send (will be postMessage as-is)
sendMessageToIframe.needIframeIdAndMessage: Need to provide iframeId and message
sendMessageToIframe.cannotSendMessage: Cannot send message to the specified iframe
sendMessageToIframe.title: iframe Message Sending Tool

requestUserChoice.description: Use when user needs to choose from multiple options. Provide options for user to choose, rather than making decisions for them.

recommendTopics.description: Use when user greets or needs topic guidance. Actively recommend relevant service topics for user to choose.
recommendTopics.contextDescription: Recommendation context, greeting=greeting, general=general, others are specific domains
recommendTopics.topicsDescription: List of recommended topics, recommend 3-5 topics

provideNextSteps.description: Use when task is completed or needs to provide follow-up guidance. Provide specific next action suggestions.
provideNextSteps.contextDescription: Currently completed task or context, used to explain why these suggestions are provided
provideNextSteps.nextStepsDescription: List of next step suggestions, recommend 3-5 specific actions

clearSuggestions.description: Use this tool when current suggestions are no longer relevant or need to clean up the interface. Applicable scenarios: clear old suggestions after topic change; clean up interface after task completion; clear after user explicitly rejects all suggestions, etc.

fileSystem.description: File system operations for world-class chat interface (based on LightningFS)
fileSystem.operationDescription: Operation type: list (list), read (read), write (write), create (create), delete (delete), rename (rename), search (search), info (info), upload (upload), download (download)
fileSystem.contentDescription: File content (required only for write and create operations)
fileSystem.newPathDescription: New path (required only for rename operation)
fileSystem.patternDescription: Search pattern (required only for search operation)
fileSystem.isDirectoryDescription: Whether it is a directory (required only for create operation)
fileSystem.missingPathOrContentParam: Missing file path or content parameter
fileSystem.missingOldOrNewPathParam: Missing original path or new path parameter
fileSystem.uploadRequiresUI: File upload function requires interface operation, please use the file manager interface
